title: STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES / LAUNDRY IN UNIT / CONCIERGE / PARKING / P
posting_body: ['STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES / LAUNDRY IN UNIT / CONCIERGE / PARKING / PET FRIENDLY', 'Listing ID #: 211201', 'Price: $15,995', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 3.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.5', 'Pets: Pets OK', 'Building Amenities', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Laundry', 'Welcome to your new home!', 'As soon as you walk into this elegant 3 bedroom residence you will be WOWED.', "With it's gracious and generously proportioned rooms, large windows and an abundance of light, it offers the finest of living.", 'You will appreciate the impeccably scaled grand living room, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and generous closet space.', 'Bring your interior designer and make this your forever home!', 'Pictures provided show the finishes of a similar apartment.', "Located in one of New York City's most desirable addresses, this elegant and iconic Upper East Side building stands 21-stories tall and features 68 luxury homes.", 'Each residence exhibits large open floor plans ranging from spacious two bedrooms to grand four bedroom homes, all with washer/dryers.', 'This 24-hour doorman buildings prime location gives residents access to some of the best fine dining and luxury shopping New York City has to offer.', 'You also have Museum Mile and Central Park right at your doorstep.', 'One of the most beautiful neighborhoods in the city, the Upper East Side feels a lot like Paris: cosmopolitan, refined, and set apart from the chaos of the rest of the city.', 'Close to many tourist destinations, the UES is always lively, but the historic architecture, clean sidewalks, and manicured flowerbeds give it a calm, unhurried atmosphere.', 'For showings contact:', 'Adel Talebpour / The Bouklis Group / 212-961-7334 (cell) / <URL> / <URL> / <URL>', 'Adel Talebpour', 'Phone: 212-402-7855', 'Mobile: 212-961-7334', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 212-402-7855 \xa0 212-961-7334 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Adel Talebpour at 212-961-7334']
